mutants.code:
import heapq

def find_k_closest_neighbors(arr, n, x, k):
    maxheap = []
    ans = []
    for i in range(n):
        diff = abs(arr[i] - x)
        heapq.heappush(maxheap, (-diff, -arr[i]))
        if len(maxheap) >= k:
            heapq.heappop(maxheap)
    while maxheap:
        ele = heapq.heappop(maxheap)
        ans.append(-ele[1])
    ans.sort()
    return ans

import heapq

def find_k_closest_neighbors(arr, n, x, k):
    maxheap = []
    ans = []
    for i in range(n):
        diff = abs(arr[i] - x)
        heapq.heappush(maxheap, (-diff, -arr[i]))
        if len(maxheap) <= k:
            heapq.heappop(maxheap)
    while maxheap:
        ele = heapq.heappop(maxheap)
        ans.append(-ele[1])
    ans.sort()
    return ans

import heapq

def find_k_closest_neighbors(arr, n, x, k):
    maxheap = []
    ans = []
    for i in range(n):
        diff = abs(arr[i] - x)
        heapq.heappush(maxheap, (-diff, -arr[i]))
        if len(maxheap) != k:
            heapq.heappop(maxheap)
    while maxheap:
        ele = heapq.heappop(maxheap)
        ans.append(-ele[1])
    ans.sort()
    return ans

def find_k_closest_neighbors(arr, n, x, k):
    maxheap = []
    ans = []
    for i in range(n):
        diff = abs(arr[i] + x)
        heapq.heappush(maxheap, (-diff, -arr[i]))
        if len(maxheap) > k:
            heapq.heappop(maxheap)
    while maxheap:
        ele = heapq.heappop(maxheap)
        ans.append(-ele[1])
    ans.sort()
    return ans

import heapq

def find_k_closest_neighbors(arr, n, x, k):
    maxheap = []
    ans = []
    for i in range(n):
        diff = abs(arr[i] - x)
        heapq.heappush(maxheap, (-diff, -arr[i]))
        if len(maxheap) > k:
            heapq.heappop(maxheap)
    while maxheap:
        ele = heapq.heappop(maxheap)
        ans.append(-ele[-1])
    ans.sort()
    return ans
